snippet: Nasiruddin Haqqani, the group’s main financier, was shot dead outside Islamabad in the latest setback for terrorist groups sheltering in Pakistan.
abstract: Pakistani officials say Nasiruddin Haqqani, senior leader of the feared Haqqani militant network, was shot dead on the outskirts of Islamabad; death is tangible new blow to the close-knit cluster of militant groups that shelter in northwestern Pakistan.

byline.original: By DECLAN WALSH and IHSANULLAH TIPU MEHSUD
byline.contributor: Declan Walsh reported from London, and Ihsanullah Tipu Mehsud from Islamabad, Pakistan. Farooq Jan Mangal contributed reporting from Khost, Afghanistan; Matthew Rosenberg from Washington; and Salman Masood from Islamabad.

lead_paragraph: Nasiruddin Haqqani, the group’s main financier, was shot dead outside Islamabad in the latest setback for terrorist groups sheltering in Pakistan.

headline.main: Militant Leader Is Killed in Pakistan
headline.print_headline: Militant Leader Is Killed in Pakistan
